article.name: Actions in Combat
article.contents:
Things you can do in combat:
- Attack - Dash - Disengage
Reactions: - Dodge (if unencumbered) - Parry (if wielding a Str melee weapon) - Block (if wielding a shield)
article.bodyHtml:
Things you can do in combat:

  • Attack
  • Dash
  • Disengage

Reactions:

  • Dodge (if unencumbered)
  • Parry (if wielding a Str melee weapon)
  • Block (if wielding a shield)
